Package com.nathcat.peoplecat_database

Class DataStore<K,V>

java.lang.Object
com.nathcat.peoplecat_database.DataStore<K,V>
Type Parameters:
K - The key type
V - The value type
public class DataStore<K,V> extends Object
A class which is intended to provided a wrapper for data files which contain a hashmap
